text:
-There are 200 things
that every man should know

99 are in this book.
101 are in this one.

And how to throw
an awesome bachelor party

is the only one
in both books.

-And Jan said it was okay
to have a stripper in here

Hello, miss.
How are you?

Pleasure to meet you.
I'm Darryl.
-Nice to meet you.

-It is not up to Jan.
It is up to me.

-Actually it's up to Toby.
-Well --

-And Michael told Toby
that he should go home.

-The red-headed guy
with the sad eyes?
I like him. He's cool.

-From HR.
-Ugh, okay.

Well, what I need you to d
is make sure

that you can turn this warehouse
into a sexy venue
in less than 30 minutes.

Promise me you can
do that.

-I'll try.
-Promise me?

-I only promise things
to my 3-year-old daughter.
-Okay.
-Okay?

-Yep. Alright.
Let's get out of here.

-Angela, could you please
change this $20

for some ones
from petty cash?
-Sure.

What do you need
so many ones for?
-A stripper.
-[ Sighs ]
Sick.

-Petty cash -- third drawer.
Petty cash -- third drawer
P-C-T-D. P-C-T-D.

-He is so disgusting.
-I'm not giving you any ones
-Damn it.

I bought my fianc√©e,
Stacy,

a stripper pole
for her birthday.
It is so cool.

But I don't know
how to install it.
